name: Bomb Billiards
description:
In BombBilliards, you're tasked with blowing up as many bombs as possible.
You have a limited number of fuses at your disposal, you need to figure out which bombs to detonate at what time in order to cause maximum destruction.

This game was made for the GTMK 2020 game jam.
It was built by a team of 2, using Unity.
All code and assets are original, except the music.

Music:
Tavern Loop One by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
